Verses: 1 baabilon Aarugal Aruge Naangal Utkaarndhu, Ange Seeyonai Ninaiththu Azhudhom.
2 adhin Naduvilirukkum Alarichchedigalinmel Engal Kinnarangalaith Thookkivaiththom.
3 engalaich Siraipidiththavargal Ange Engal Paadalgalaiyum, Engalaip Paazhaakkinavargal Mangala Geedhaththaiyum Virumbi: Seeyonin Paattugalil Siladhai Engalukkup Paadungal Endru Sonnaargal.
5 erusaleme, Naan Unnai Marandhaal En Valadhukai Than Thozhilai Marappadhaaga.
6 naan Unnai Ninaiyaamalum, Erusalemai En Mukkiyamaana Magizhchchiyilum Adhikamaaga Ennaamalumponaal, En Naavu En Melvaayodu Ottikkolvadhaaga.
7 karththaave, Erusalemin Naalil Edhomin Puththirarai Ninaiyum; Avargal: Adhai Idiththuppodungal, Asdhibaaramattum Idiththuppodungal Endru Sonnaargale.
8 baabilon Kumaaraththiye, Paazhaaippogiravale, Nee Engalukkuch Seydhapadi Unakkup Padhil Seygiravan Baakkiyavaan.
9 un Kuzhandhaigalaip Pidiththu, Kallinmel Modhiyadikkiravan Baakkiyavaan.
